articles.description: The Chancellor has announced a new low-deposit mortgage guarantee scheme - but how will it work?
articles.content:
After days of speculation, chancellor Rishi Sunak confirmed in his Budget speech today that the government will back a new mortgage guarantee scheme.
Sunak has announced a new guarantee scheme to br… [+9345 chars]
